instructions:
In a small bowl, break up the drained tuna and mix in the pizza sauce. Place 1 tbsp crushed potato chips
in each of 2 one cup Pyrex custard cups or ramekins. Divide the tuna mixture on top of the potato chips.
Then sprinkle the remaining potato chips and top with chunks of butter. Bake in a 400 F oven for about 25
minutes or until heated and bubbling around the edges. Serves 2.
name: Pizza Tuna
creator: Mary Decker
